respStmt.resp: Automatic separation of word and punctuation tokens for base-texts, and assignment of unique ID numbers to each token
respStmt.name: ID_tokens.py

editionStmt.p: Clementine Vulgate Project (public domain), based mainly on edition by A. Colunga and L. Turrado (La Editorial Católica, Madrid, 1946) (see http://vulsearch.sourceforge.net).

revisionDesc.change: Automatically processed: The revisionDesc section was automatically created during token annotation.

Automatically processed: Words and punctuation were separated into tokens. Each token was tagged with either w (word) or pc (punctuation), and given a unique ID number based on its line ID and its position in that line.
